backend/main.mo: Implements a simple session store for WebRTC signaling, handling offers, answers, and ICE candidate exchange between host and guest.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing removal of a footer attribution line and listing related files, components, and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing auto-generated summaries of key frontend modules and components.
frontend/android/.gitignore: Gitignore rules for Android builds, excluding generated, build, and sensitive keystore files.
frontend/android/app/build.gradle: Gradle build config for the Android app defining SDK versions, dependencies, build types, and signing behavior.
frontend/android/app/src/main/AndroidMan: Android manifest declaring app permissions, main activity, FileProvider, and supported hardware features.
frontend/android/app/src/main/java/com/f: Empty placeholder file for a potential AdMob native plugin.
Empty placeholder file for native ad rendering.
Main Capacitor bridge activity bootstrapping the Android application.
frontend/android/app/src/main/res/drawab: Vector drawable defining the legacy FileDrop launcher icon.
Vector drawable defining the legacy splash icon graphic.
Layer-list drawable defining splash background and centered splash icon.
frontend/android/app/src/main/res/layout: Layout containing a CoordinatorLayout with a FrameLayout container for the main activity.
frontend/android/app/src/main/res/mipmap: Adaptive round launcher icon referencing background and foreground drawables.
Adaptive launcher icon referencing background and foreground drawables.
frontend/android/app/src/main/res/values: Color resource definitions for splash screen and theme colors.
Color resource defining launcher background color.
String resources containing app name and package identifiers.
Defines main app theme and splash screen launcher theme.
frontend/android/app/src/main/res/xml/fi: FileProvider paths configuration enabling file access from app cache and files directories.
frontend/android/build.gradle: Top-level Gradle build file configuring repositories and global build settings.
frontend/android/gradle.properties: Gradle properties configuring JVM args, AndroidX, ABI settings, and signing placeholders.
frontend/android/keystore/README.md: Instructions for creating and managing the release keystore without committing it.
frontend/android/settings.gradle: Gradle settings defining project modules and Capacitor integration.
frontend/capacitor.config.ts: Capacitor configuration defining app metadata, build settings, server config, and splash plugin options.
frontend/docs/play-store/DATA_SAFETY_NOT: Explains FileDrop’s Google Play data safety responses, emphasizing zero data collection and detailing permissions for camera and storage.
frontend/docs/play-store/LISTING_METADAT: Provides English Play Store listing text including descriptions, features, tags, requirements, and release notes for FileDrop.
frontend/docs/play-store/PLAY_STORE_CHEC: A step-by-step checklist for preparing, building, testing, and submitting FileDrop to the Google Play Store.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based stylesheet defining light and dark theme CSS variables and global styles.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entrypoint setting metadata, icons, manifest, and mounting the frontend application.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app metadata, icons, theme colors, categories, and screenshots for AirShare.
frontend/public/privacy.html: Privacy policy stating FileDrop collects no personal data and only uses temporary signaling metadata for peer-to-peer transfers.
frontend/README_ANDROID.md: Guide for building the Android version of FileDrop, covering prerequisites and setup steps.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level app managing session roles, WebRTC state, and rendering appropriate session screens based on sessionState.
frontend/src/features/ads/components/Nat: Empty placeholder file for a native ad card component.
frontend/src/features/ads/nativeAdmob/na: Empty placeholder for AdMob integration logic.
Empty placeholder for an AdMob plugin wrapper.
frontend/src/features/ads/nativeAdmob/us: Empty placeholder for a hook to load and manage native ads.
frontend/src/features/session/components: Renders the top app header with logo and brand title.
Displays UI for an active WebRTC session, handling file selection, incoming transfers, and progress UI.
Reusable error banner component with retry and dismiss actions.
Initial landing UI showing feature highlights and options to start as sender or receiver.
Generates and displays a QR code for sharing the session code.
Receiver-side screen for joining a session via manual code or QR scanning and establishing WebRTC connection.
Sender-side screen that generates a session code, shows QR, and waits for the receiver to connect.
Shows connection status and session code with an option to disconnect.
frontend/src/features/session/state/sess: Defines session state types and context structure for session handling.
frontend/src/features/session/utils/join: Generates, validates, formats session codes and handles simple QR payload encoding/decoding.
frontend/src/features/session/utils/qrCo: Creates a simplified, non‑spec QR code rendering on a canvas using deterministic hashing and basic QR patterns.
frontend/src/features/session/utils/sess: Provides time‑to‑live logic for sessions, including expiry checks and formatted remaining time.
frontend/src/features/transfer/component: UI card component for Android file‑permission flows, showing rationale, denial, or checking states.
File selection component integrating Android permission flow, file list management, and picker activation.
Displays incoming file transfer details and size totals, allowing the user to accept or decline.
Shows file transfer progress with percentage, sizes, role‑based icons, and cancel/complete handling.
frontend/src/features/transfer/hooks/use: Manages Android runtime permission flow for file picking, including checking, requesting, and opening settings.
Implements chunked file transfer over a WebRTC data channel with progress tracking and metadata exchange.
frontend/src/features/transfer/utils/dow: Provides a helper to trigger browser downloads from Blob objects.
frontend/src/features/transfer/utils/per: Generates Android-specific permission text for media or storage access and provides a generic fallback.
frontend/src/features/webrtc/hooks/usePe: Sets up a WebRTC peer connection with data channel handling and polling-based offer/answer exchange via an actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor instance tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and AuthClient setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder exporting nothing for centralized query handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for light/dark themes and UI defaults.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme colors, typography, animations, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Defines overall project metadata, existing features, architectural notes, and versioned state for an Android-packaged WebRTC file‑transfer app. Describes requirements, signaling design, UI features, and release considerations.
